articles.author: Chiranjivi Chakraborty, Sangmi Cha
articles.title: China’s Defense Stocks Advance After India-Pakistan Clash - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Shares of Chinese defense-manufacturing companies rallied on Wednesday, as the escalation in border tensions between India and Pakistan boosted the outlook for mainland exporters.
articles.content:
